data: {"seo": [], "title": "RFP for Supply, Implementation and Maintenance of a Security Awareness and Attack Simulation Solution", "content": "This document constitutes the formal Request for Proposals (RFP) for Supply, implementation, and Maintenance of a Security Awareness and Attack Simulation solution and is being availed on open tender basis and is open for bids from companies that meet the requirements stated herein.", "enable_cta": false, "form_title": "Sign up for KCB Tender Updates", "tender_ref": null, "updated_by": 2, "tender_form": "tender_form", "banner_image": "suppliers-banner-1728477137.jpg", "banner_title": "Suppliers", "date_uploaded": "2024-10-08", "deadline_date": "2024-10-18", "banner_cta_link": null, "banner_cta_text": null, "banner_subtitle": "About Us", "tender_document": "rfp-security-awareness-and-attack-simulation-solution.pdf", "form_button_label": "Submit", "enable_tender_form": true, "form_success_message": "Successfuly submitted"}
